patthana17.1:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:2.1_1: Kusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana17.1:2.1_2: kusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana17.1:3.1_0: Akusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:3.1_1: Akusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana17.1:3.1_2: akusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana17.1:4.1_0: Abyākataṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:4.1_1: Abyākataṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:4.1_2: Abyākataṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.1:5.1_0: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana17.1:6.1_0: Abyākataṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.1:7.1_0: Kusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana17.1:7.1_1: Kusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana17.1:7.1_2: Kusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.1:8.1_0: Akusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.1:9.1_0: Abyākataṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana17.1:9.1_1: Abyākataṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana17.1:9.1_2: Abyākataṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.1:10.1_0: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā terasa …pe…
patthana17.1:14.1_0: Kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nakusalassa nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana17.1:15.1_0: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare nava …pe…
patthana17.1:15.1_1: sahajāte terasa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, pacchājāte nava, kamme terasa, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre …pe…
patthana17.1:15.1_2: magge terasa, sampayutte nava, vippayutte nava …pe…
patthana17.1:16.1_0: Akusalaṁ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:16.1_1: Akusalaṁ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana17.1:16.1_2: akusalaṁ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:17.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe…
patthana17.1:18.1_0: Abyākataṁ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:18.1_1: Abyākataṁ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:18.1_2: Abyākataṁ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:19.1_0: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā aṭṭha …pe…
patthana17.1:19.1_2: navipāke pañca, najhāne namagge nasampayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā novigate tīṇi.
patthana17.1:20.1_0: Kusalaṁ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.1:21.1_0: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
